directions.text: Peel and cut potatoes into 1 inch pieces.
Arrange potatoes in a glass baking dish.
Combine all other ingredients excluding marshmallows into saucepan.
Cook ingredients over a medium heat, bring to boil, until sugar dissolves.
Cover potatoes with sauce, save some for basting.
Cook at 375° for 50 mins, uncover to baste every 20 mins.
Remove any excess sauce with a turkey baster leaving ¼ inch.
Cover potatoes with marshmallows and broil for 4 mins before severing.
